task_name: Convert HTML code to Angular code
query_example: Sample HTML -> Angular Query: Convert the following HTML snippet into an Angular component. The HTML is a simple form with an input field and a submit button. Bind the input value to a variable called 'userInput' and display the value in real-time below the form. <form> <input type="text" placeholder="Type something..."> <button type="submit">Submit</button> </form>
